title.text: Fast and Flexible MWE Candidate Generation with the mwetoolkit

abstractContent.text: We present an experimental environment for computer-assisted extraction of Multiword Expressions (MWEs) from corpora.

entities.text: computer-assisted extraction of Multiword Expressions (MWEs) from corpora

abstractContent.text: Candidate extraction works in two steps: generation and filtering.
We focus on recent improvements in the former, for which we increased speed and flexibility.
We present examples that show the potential gains for users and applications .
